sentences.english: The wind has blown apples down.
It is unclear how the stores procure the Apple merchandise.
sentences.chinese: 目前还不清楚这些商店是如何获得苹果的商品。

sentences.english: Billions of apps have been downloaded from Apple 's ( AAPL - news - people ) App Store alone.
sentences.chinese: 已有数以亿计的应用从苹果的应用程序商店中被下载。

sentences.english: These red apples are big, but those green ones are small.
sentences.chinese: 这些红苹果大，而那些绿苹果小。

sentences.english: These red apples are big, but those green ones are small.
sentences.chinese: 这些红苹果大，而那些绿苹果小。

sentences.english: Add this to the cabbage, carrots and apples evenly.
sentences.chinese: 然后在这里面加入等量的紫甘蓝，胡萝卜和苹果。

sentences.english: She was asked by her mother to go to buy apples at the greengrocer's at the corner.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲要她到转角的蔬菜店去买些苹果回来。

sentences.english: The barrel was nearly empty and I had to climb right inside to get my apple.
sentences.chinese: 苹果桶快空了，我只好钻进去拿苹果。

sentences.english: The barrel was nearly empty and I had to climb right inside to get my apple.
sentences.chinese: 苹果桶快空了，我只好钻进去拿苹果。

sentences.english: We dined on chicken, potatoes, salad and apple-pie.
sentences.chinese: 正餐我们吃的是鸡，土豆，凉拌菜和苹果馅饼。

sentences.english: His firm was named in homage to the Beatles' record label, Apple.
sentences.chinese: 他的公司命名苹果以向披头士乐队的唱片致敬。

sentences.english: We are going to pick apples next week.
sentences.chinese: 下星期我们打算去摘苹果。

sentences.english: The fourth industry Apple could potentially impact is the appliance industry.
sentences.chinese: 苹果还可以进行改变的第四个领域是家电行业。

sentences.english: Or with Mr. Jobs, if Apple had remained just Apple Computer?
sentences.chinese: 如果苹果只是苹果电脑，人们还会如此关注乔布斯吗？

sentences.english: Or with Mr. Jobs, if Apple had remained just Apple Computer?
sentences.chinese: 如果苹果只是苹果电脑，人们还会如此关注乔布斯吗？

definition: Xiaomi, Chinese electronics company founded in 2010

three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
Google, Internet company and search engine
